title: Pilot
episode_desc: In an attempt to beautify her town, Leslie Knope takes on the seemingly simple job of helping turn an abandoned construction pit into a park.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Canvassing
episode_desc: Leslie gets a town hall meeting to discuss her park idea, but she finds out that public reception is less than receptive.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: The Reporter
episode_desc: Leslie gets a newspaper reporter to do a story about her and the park idea, but becomes upset when she finds out that the reporter slept with Mark.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Boys' Club
episode_desc: Leslie tries to infiltrate the boys' club of politics by crashing an after-work gathering at the town hall. Trying to fit in, she opens a gift basket breaking the local government ethics, and then is called before an ethics committee.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: The Banquet
episode_desc: At a banquet honouring her mother, Leslie tries to convince a local zoning official to support her park project. But sensing resistance, Lesie resorts to blackmail. Meanwhile, Tom and Mark ditch the festivities to hit the bars.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Rock Show
episode_desc: Leslie doesn't realize that a dinner with a much older man from the zoning commission is actually a date set up by her mom. Andy gets his cast taken off, but Ann gets mad when she finds out it could have been off two weeks ago.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Pawnee Zoo
episode_desc: Leslie becomes a political lightning rod when the penguin wedding she sets up at the Pawnee Zoo turns out to be for two male penguins.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: The Stakeout
episode_desc: Leslie sets up a stakeout with Tom to find out who's growing marijuana in the community garden she set up in the pit, but it also gives her an opportunity to scout out Ann and Mark's first date.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Beauty Pageant
episode_desc: Leslie serves as a judge in the Miss Pawnee Beauty Pageant but is disappointed with the results, and Ann finds out that her ex-boyfriend Andy is living in the pit.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Practice Date
episode_desc: Ann helps a nervous Leslie get ready for her first date with Dave by giving her a "practice date," while everybody else at the office tries to dig up the juiciest dirt on each other.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Sister City
episode_desc: Leslie welcomes a delegation from Pawnee's sister city in Venezuela, whose goal is to humiliate their hosts.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Kaboom
episode_desc: Andy is injured when Leslie goes out on her own to fill the hole, and he decides to sue Pawnee as a result.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Greg Pikitis
episode_desc: Leslie tries to stop a high school punk who vandalizes the park every Halloween, but will he get the last laugh? Meanwhile, Ann's Halloween party is a bore until Tom saves the day.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Ron and Tammy
episode_desc: Ron's ex-wife uses sex to manipulate Ron and get Leslie's vacant lot to build a library, while Leslie gets Andy a job in the building as a shoe-shine man.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: The Camel
episode_desc: After one of the murals in City Hall is defaced, Leslie and the Parks Department compete to come up with a new design. Meanwhile, Andy and Ron share an uncomfortable moment at the shoeshine stand.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Hunting Trip
episode_desc: Leslie tries to prove she can hang with the guys so she invites herself on Ron's annual hunting trip, but things don't go as planned. Meanwhile, April and Andy bond in the office while everyone is away.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Tom's Divorce
episode_desc: Leslie accidentally finds out that Tom is getting a divorce and tries to lift his spirits by sending him to dinner and a strip club, but Tom doesn't tell her that it was just a sham Green Card marriage.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Christmas Scandal
episode_desc: Leslie is falsely accused of having sexual relations with a sleazy Pawnee councilman. Meanwhile, the rest of the office takes on Leslie's work while she deals with the scandal, and officer Dave has more surprising news for Leslie.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: The Set Up
episode_desc: Ann sets Leslie up on a blind date with a rude MRI technician, and Mark becomes jealous because he thinks Ann is saving another prospect for Leslie for herself. Meanwhile, Tom helps Ron find an assistant.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Leslie's House
episode_desc: Did Leslie abuse her power by bringing in community center teachers to her house to help throw a dinner party to impress her new suitor?
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Sweetums
episode_desc: Leslie and Ron become adversaries when a dishonest candy company vies for a concessions contract, while everybody else in the department reluctantly helps Tom move out of his house.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Galentine's Day
episode_desc: Leslie and Justin try to reunite Leslie's Mom with an old flame for Valentine's Day, only to discover he's a total loon. And Justin's rude behavior during the entire episode causes Leslie to look at him in a new light.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Woman of the Year
episode_desc: Leslie is upset when Ron wins a coveted "Woman of the Year" award, Tom looks for investors for a new night club, and Andy considers moving into his own place.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: The Possum
episode_desc: Leslie puts together a task force at the mayor's request to catch a possum at the golf course, while Mark forces Ron to get his personal building up to code.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Park Safety
episode_desc: Leslie goes on a crusade to improve park safety after Jerry is mugged, which is later discovered to be a lie. Meanwhile, Ron tries to teach the office self-defense, but winds up injuring Andy instead.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Summer Catalog
episode_desc: Preparing the Summer Events Catalog, Leslie decides to take Ron and the past directors of the Parks Department out for a picnic lunch. Tom enlists the help of Ann and Mark to pose for the cover photo.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: 94 Meetings
episode_desc: Leslie goes all out to save a gazebo at a mansion on the historical register from being destroyed, while April gets in trouble with Ron when she accidentally schedules 93 meetings for him on the same day.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Telethon
episode_desc: Leslie struggles to stay awake and fill the overnight hours at a local telethon when Tom and celebrity guest Detlef Schrempf are sidetracked at a nightclub, and the answer to her problems could be a surprise marriage proposal.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: The Master Plan
episode_desc: Everyone is excited about celebrating April's 21st birthday except Leslie, who is preoccupied with the prospect of her budget being cut by the state auditor's office.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Freddy Spaghetti
episode_desc: The government is shut down and the parks are closed, but Leslie tries to skirt the rules to hold a children's concert in the vacant lot. Meanwhile, will April's jealousy of Ann keep her from getting together with Andy?
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Go Big or Go Home
episode_desc: Leslie encourages Ann to go on a date with Chris so that she can ask for money for Leslie's department, while Ron, Andy, and Tom put together a two-team youth basketball league.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Flu Season
episode_desc: Leslie gets the flu right before an important fund-raising pitch for the Harvest Festival, Chris tries frantically to avoid catching the bug, and Ron hires Andy to replace April while she is out.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

episode_desc: A crackpot handcuffs himself to a pipe in Leslie's office and demands that "Twilight" be placed in the Pawnee Time Capsule, and Chris tries to help Andy woo April in spite of Ann's reservations.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Ron & Tammy 2
episode_desc: After Ron breaks up with Tom's ex-wife, he decides to get back together with his Tammy, much to everyone's horror. Meanwhile, Leslie and Ben try to get the local police to donate their services to the upcoming Harvest Festival.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

episode_desc: Leslie hits the Pawnee media circuit to promote the Harvest Festival, but Ben freaks out on air when his past is exposed. Meanwhile, April threatens Andy that she'll leave for Indianapolis unless he does her chores.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

episode_desc: Leslie and Ron go to Indianapolis to receive a commendation from the state. While there, Ron finds out his favorite steak house is closed and Leslie thinks Chris is cheating on Ann. Meanwhile, Tom throws a party for a fragrance designer.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Harvest Festival
episode_desc: On the day before the Harvest Festival, a local Native American leader places a "curse" on the event because Leslie refuses to give in to his demands.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

episode_desc: Leslie sets up a camping trip to brainstorm for new ideas, but she's the one who surprisingly can't come up with anything. Meanwhile, Chris returns to Pawnee as temporary city manager, causing further confusion for Ann.

episode_desc: Andy and April's party turns into a surprise wedding, but Leslie does not approve. Meanwhile, Ben debates whether to stay in Pawnee, and Donna gives Ann advice at a singles mixer.

episode_desc: Leslie is matched up with Tom on an Internet dating website, while Chris and Ron compete in a hamburger cook-off.

episode_desc: Chris deals with community uproar over Jerry's new painting, which features a nude Leslie, and Ben tries to help teach Andy and April responsibility after he moves in with them.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

episode_desc: Leslie is forced to deal with a former beloved colleague-turned bitter enemy when a neighboring town separates a shared park with a fence. Meanwhile, Ron fears the worst when Leslie finds out about his birthday.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

episode_desc: While Tom invites everyone to the Snakehole as he debuts a new drink, Leslie encourages Ann to apply for a job with the city. However, at the nightclub, Leslie and Ann get into a fight over their dating habits.

episode_desc: The romantic tension between Leslie and Ben reaches dangerous levels when they take a work-related road trip to Indianapolis, Tom's "game show" creates tension between Andy and April, and Ron teaches government to a nine year old.

episode_desc: Leslie's mom makes a pass at Ben, not knowing that he and Leslie are dating. Meanwhile, Chris makes radical changes in the office, and nobody is happy with them.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

episode_desc: While the department sets up a memorial service for Li'l Sebastian, Ron finds out about Leslie and Ben, Tom considers taking a job in the private sector, and Chris deals with his own mortality after he discovers that he has tendinitis.

episode_desc: Leslie decides to run for political office, which means that she has to break up with Ben. Meanwhile, Ron goes into hiding from Tammy 1, and Tom tries to recruit Andy for his latest business venture.

episode_desc: Ron becomes a wimp after he and Tammy 1 get back together and Leslie tries to save him, Ben discovers that Tom's business is hemorrhaging money, and Ann has a frustrating experience shooting a diabetes PSA with Chris.

episode_desc: Leslie is accused of not being born in Pawnee while she is trying to promote her new book about the city. Meanwhile, Ann tries in vain to have a five-minute conversation with Ron and April.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

episode_desc: Ron's Pawnee Rangers and Leslie's competing scout group, the Pawnee Goddesses, share a weekend in the wilderness, Ben joins Tom and Donna on "Treat Yo Self Day," and Chris takes an interest in Jerry's daughter.

episode_desc: Leslie tries to manipulate a new park project to extend her working relationship with Ben, Tom and Jerry work together to create a new department logo, and Andy tries to find the right college course to sign up for.

episode_desc: Chris brings Leslie up on ethics charges for her relationship with Ben.

episode_desc: Leslie unsuccessfully tries to win over a focus group member who made a negative comment by going bowling with him, and Chris gets some bad relationship news while calling for campaign donations.

episode_desc: Ann's friends try to set her up on a date for Valentine's Day, while Ron and Andy try to help Ben solve Leslie's series of complicated riddles to reveal the location of their Valentine's Day date.

episode_desc: While Leslie tries to get an endorsement from the police chief, Dave returns to tell Leslie that he's still in love with her. Meanwhile, Andy tries to put together a campaign theme song.

episode_desc: Leslie's attempts to balance her campaign with her job results in major blunders on both fronts, Chris becomes attached to Andy's dog Champion, and April gets fed up with Tom and Ann coming to her for relationship advice.

episode_desc: Leslie and Ben have their work cut out for them when Bobby Newport hires a Washington professional as his campaign manager, while Ron gets the department to tackle a project in Leslie's absence to get Chris off his back.

episode_desc: Leslie's campaign could be in big trouble when she records a TV interview after a couple of drinks. Meanwhile, April tries to set Chris up with Andy's women's studies professor, but things go unexpectedly.

episode_desc: Leslie and Andy go to Washington on business--and to see Ben and April. Back in Pawnee, Ron is in charge of the employee barbecue, and Tom and Ann pretend to still be together.

title: Filibuster
episode_desc: Leslie blows off Ben's birthday party to filibuster councilman Jamm's motion, Andy pays a surprise visit to April, Tom tries to win a stuffed bear for Nadia, and Ron gets frustrated by an arcade hunting game.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Recall Vote
episode_desc: Leslie goes into a funk after she loses the recall election, the rest of the office sets up a Haunted House, and Tom turns to Ron and a local online trendsetter to help save Rent-a-Swag.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Fluoride
episode_desc: Leslie's new bold attitude as a lame duck costs Ben his job at Sweetums, Ron helps Chris build a crib, and the department tries to find the perfect dog that matches the personality for every Parks Department employee.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: The Cones of Dunshire
episode_desc: Chris mediates one final skirmish between Leslie and councilman Jamm, Ben begins a new job as an accountant, and Ron lets Donna and Tom try to sell one of his cabins.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Second Chunce
episode_desc: Leslie has a new opportunity to run for city council just as her term is ending, Tom comes up with a new business venture after selling Rent-a-Swag, and Chris and Ann decide to find out the sex of their baby.

title: Farmers Market

title: Ann and Chris
episode_desc: On Ann and Chris's last night in Pawnee, Leslie throws a grand farewell party and attempts to fulfill one last promise. Meanwhile, Tom, Ben, Ron, and Andy struggle to find the perfect going away gift for Chris.

episode_desc: Ben tries to surprise Leslie with an anniversary gift; Tom and Andy help Leslie put a positive spin on the merger; April flexes her authority as Donna's boss.

episode_desc: Leslie's efforts to take down the wall separating Eagleton and Pawnee yield unexpected results; Ben and Tom meet with possible sponsors for the concert; Ron finds a new hobby.

episode_desc: Leslie throws a hasty Galentine's Day in an attempt to find a replacement for Ann. Tom and Ben look to finalize a deal on tents for the Unity Concert, while Ron finds himself looking after Andy.

episode_desc: The Parks Department puts together the high school prom, and Ron tries to keep Leslie from bringing on a high school student as her summer intern.

episode_desc: Leslie and Ben run a charity auction to raise funds for the unity concert. April steps in to manage Andy's schedule, while Donna asks Ron for help with her ex-boyfriend.
show_desc: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

title: Moving Up: Part 1
episode_desc: Leslie debates whether to take the job with the National Parks Service during a convention in San Francisco while Ben tries to get free wifi for Pawnee. Meanwhile in Pawnee, Tom decides to open his bistro early.

title: Moving Up: Part 2
episode_desc: During the Unity Concert, Leslie invites some coworkers to join her at her new job in Chicago, while Andy thinks about reuniting Mouse Rat. Meanwhile, Tom's Bistro prepares for the Unity Concert after-party.
